full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title: Roof Deck Waterproofing Repair

A tender is being invited for the Roof Deck Waterproofing Repair project, located at the False Creek Small Craft Harbour in Vancouver, British Columbia. The project involves repairing and replacing the roof deck waterproofing system to address issues with ponding water, leakage, and runoff into the locker areas below.

#### Project Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4230196562
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4230196562
* **Publication Date**: September 26, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 20, 2023, at 2:00 PM
* **Contract Duration**: The expected contract start date is not specified, with an expected end date of December 15, 2023.

#### Project Scope

The scope of work includes, but is not limited to:

* Replacing roof deck waterproofing upturns
* Installing new drains

#### Selection Criteria

The selection will be made based on the lowest price submitted by the tenderers.

#### Trade Agreements

This tender adheres to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Location

The project is located at the False Creek Small Craft Harbour in Vancouver, British Columbia.

#### Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Person**: Serdar Eskicakit
* **Email**: serdar.eskicakit@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17557038?extsite=MTc1NTcwMzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please note that all relevant documents and plans can be found on the associated notice URL. Any proposal submissions must be received by the closing date and time specified above.
